version="24.7.17"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="sy-jU2_jJEp-g0ULxoUo"> <mxGraphModel dx="555" dy="625" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="0" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="qohj4JZpbFBa8SHT0XWK-30" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=default;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=12;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=default;startSize=8;endArrow=none;endFill=0;endSize=8;curved=1;strokeWidth=5;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="120" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-60.19" y="-173" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="45.81" y="-146" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3qRvt8arezcaTB0E07PK-2" value="<br><div style="background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); line-height: 18px;"><div style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; white-space: pre; color: rgb(68, 140, 39);">Figure 3.24</span><span style="font-family: &quot;Fira Code&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; white-space: pre;"><font color="#777777"> </font></span><font face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace" color="#333333"><span style="font-size: 13px; white-space: pre;">Collision ray avoiding a wall</span></font></div></div><div><br></div>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-219" y="-51" width="350" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3qRvt8arezcaTB0E07PK-4" value="Character A" style="edgeStyle=none;curved=1;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontSize=12;startSize=8;endSize=8;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" edge="1"> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qohj4JZpbFBa8SHT0XWK-19" value="Collision point" style="edgeStyle=none;curved=0;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontSize=10;startSize=8;endSize=4;endArrow=classic;endFill=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;align=center;" as="offset" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-7" y="-157" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16qLQAEZzPh01bKDreZQ-1" value="Collision normal" style="edgeLabel;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=10;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" connectable="0"
